typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> TCrossReference
TCrossReference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == -3) ~> ProdGroups
TCrossReference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == 122) ~> CoverageCodes
CoverageCodes select(mapColumn(
		coverage_source_code = SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		source_system = SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		coverage_target_code = TARGET_CODE,
		coverage_target_desc = TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		code_type = CODE_TYPE,
		code_type_id = CODE_TYPE_ID,
		code2 = CODE2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCoverageColumns
ProdGroups select(mapColumn(
		coverage_source_code = SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		prd_group_target_code = TARGET_CODE,
		source_system = SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		prd_group_target_desc = TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProdColumns
